name: Fortune Inc.
description:
Welcome to Fortune Inc., where luck is on your side!

It's your first day as a Luck Fairy in the Small Wishes department, where you'll be tasked with reviewing peoples' wishes and choosing the dice that will determine their fate. Read their claim, choose the amount and types of dice you think best fit the situation, and hope to roll high. But make sure to keep some luck left over. The management seems very particular about that...
